price: Hai Nabi, bertakwalah kepada Allah dan janganlah kamu menuruti (keinginan) orang-orang kafir dan orang-orang munafik.  Sesungguhnya Allah adalah Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Bijaksana,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
